message: Going to drupalcon in two weeks - is there a local pizza/steak/icecream which absolutly rocks?
Now, I'm not saying any of these are the best...but they are definitely Chicago icons. If you want foodie joints, there's a ton, too.
Your power steakhouse is probably Gibson's http://goo.gl/maps/zbG6
Your Deep Dish Pizza choice is probably Pizzeria Uno http://goo.gl/maps/eoJZ
Your legendary burger joint is Billy Goat Tavern http://goo.gl/maps/wph2
